summary: 批量获取媒资信息，支持传入多个mediaId。

schema.description: 所有待查询的媒资ID，以逗号分隔。

批量查询的媒资额外信息，默认只返回BasicInfo，额外文件信息内容包括：

\-FileInfo

\-DynamicMetaData

InputURL.title: 待注册的媒资在相应系统中的地址
InputURL.description: 待注册的媒资在相应系统中的地址

FileBasicInfo.title: 文件基础信息，包含时长，大小等
FileBasicInfo.description: 文件基础信息，包含时长，大小等

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "******11-DB8D-4A9A-875B-275798******",
  "MediaInfos": [
    {
      "MediaId": "******c48fb37407365d4f2cd8******",
      "MediaBasicInfo": {
        "MediaId": "******c48fb37407365d4f2cd8******",
        "InputURL": "https://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.mp4",
        "MediaType": "video",
        "BusinessType": "general",
        "Source": "oss",
        "Title": "标题",
        "Description": "描述",
        "Category": "分类",
        "MediaTags": "标签,tag1",
        "CoverURL": "http://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.png?Expires=<ExpireTime>&OSSAccessKeyId=<OSSAccessKeyId>&Signature=<Signature>&security-token=<SecurityToken>",
        "UserData": "userDataTest",
        "Snapshots": "[{\"bucket\":\"example-bucket\",\"count\":\"3\",\"iceJobId\":\"******f48f0e4154976b2b8c45******\",\"location\":\"oss-cn-beijing\",\"snapshotRegular\":\"example.jpg\",\"templateId\":\"******e6a6440b29eb60bd7c******\"}]",
        "Status": "Normal",
        "TranscodeStatus": "Init",
        "CreateTime": "2020-12-26T04:11:10Z",
        "ModifiedTime": "2020-12-26T04:11:12Z",
        "DeletedTime": "2020-12-26T04:11:10Z",
        "SpriteImages": "[{\"bucket\":\"example-bucket\",\"count\":\"32\",\"iceJobId\":\"******83ec44d58b2069def2e******\",\"location\":\"oss-cn-shanghai\",\"snapshotRegular\":\"example/example-{Count}.jpg\",\"spriteRegular\":\"example/example-{TileCount}.jpg\",\"templateId\":\"******e438b14ff39293eaec25******\",\"tileCount\":\"1\"}]"
      },
      "FileInfoList": [
        {
          "FileBasicInfo": {
            "FileName": "example",
            "FileStatus": "Normal",
            "FileType": "source_file",
            "FileSize": "30611502",
            "FileUrl": "http://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.mp4?Expires=<ExpireTime>&OSSAccessKeyId=<OSSAccessKeyId>&Signature=<Signature>&security-token=<SecurityToken>",
            "Region": "cn-shanghai",
            "FormatName": "mov,mp4,m4a,3gp,3g2,mj2",
            "Duration": "200",
            "Bitrate": "1132.68",
            "Width": "1920",
            "Height": "1080"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<BatchGetMediaInfosResponse>
    <RequestId>******11-DB8D-4A9A-875B-275798******</RequestId>
    <MediaInfos>
        <MediaId>******c48fb37407365d4f2cd8******</MediaId>
        <MediaBasicInfo>
            <MediaId>******c48fb37407365d4f2cd8******</MediaId>
            <InputURL>https://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.mp4</InputURL>
            <MediaType>video</MediaType>
            <BusinessType>general</BusinessType>
            <Source>oss</Source>
            <Title>标题</Title>
            <Description>描述</Description>
            <Category>分类</Category>
            <MediaTags>标签,tag1</MediaTags>
            <CoverURL>http://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.png?Expires=<ExpireTime>&OSSAccessKeyId=<OSSAccessKeyId>&Signature=<Signature>&security-token=<SecurityToken></CoverURL>
            <UserData>userDataTest</UserData>
            <Snapshots>[{"bucket":"example-bucket","count":"3","iceJobId":"******f48f0e4154976b2b8c45******","location":"oss-cn-beijing","snapshotRegular":"example.jpg","templateId":"******e6a6440b29eb60bd7c******"}]</Snapshots>
            <Status>Normal</Status>
            <TranscodeStatus>Init</TranscodeStatus>
            <CreateTime>2020-12-26T04:11:10Z</CreateTime>
            <ModifiedTime>2020-12-26T04:11:12Z</ModifiedTime>
            <DeletedTime>2020-12-26T04:11:10Z</DeletedTime>
            <SpriteImages>[{"bucket":"example-bucket","count":"32","iceJobId":"******83ec44d58b2069def2e******","location":"oss-cn-shanghai","snapshotRegular":"example/example-{Count}.jpg","spriteRegular":"example/example-{TileCount}.jpg","templateId":"******e438b14ff39293eaec25******","tileCount":"1"}]</SpriteImages>
        </MediaBasicInfo>
        <FileInfoList>
            <FileBasicInfo>
                <FileName>example</FileName>
                <FileStatus>Normal</FileStatus>
                <FileType>source_file</FileType>
                <FileSize>30611502</FileSize>
                <FileUrl>http://example-bucket.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/example.mp4?Expires=<ExpireTime>&OSSAccessKeyId=<OSSAccessKeyId>&Signature=<Signature>&security-token=<SecurityToken></FileUrl>
                <Region>cn-shanghai</Region>
                <FormatName>mov,mp4,m4a,3gp,3g2,mj2</FormatName>
                <Duration>200</Duration>
                <Bitrate>1132.68</Bitrate>
                <Width>1920</Width>
                <Height>1080</Height>
            </FileBasicInfo>
        </FileInfoList>
    </MediaInfos>
</BatchGetMediaInfosResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 批量获取媒体信息
